mosinstall.name: SBD Accordion Menu
mosinstall.author: Matthew Cooper
mosinstall.description:
Displays an alternate menu to Joomla's main menu module. Provides an accordion style menu, which can either be triggered on mouse over the menu or by clicking to expand. Only the first level is expandable, all following levels are automatically expanded but indented.

The menu is fully configurable by CSS, the menus default CSS file can be located in the following location:

/modules/mod_sbdrollmenu/mod_sbd_rollmenu.css

There are very few configurable options as the main control is via CSS and Javascript. The core javascript is using the Yahoo User Interface Library.

If you have any questions regarding this script visit our forums: SBD Accordion Menu Forums

For the latest download check the following location: Latest Version

We hope you find this module useful.

Matthew Cooper
Simple By Design

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: menulevel_sfx
param.label: Enable Menu ID CSS
param.description: Enable different CSS code to be used based on each top level menu id

param.name: level_sfx
param.label: Enable Menu Level CSS
param.description: Enable different CSS code to be used based on the sub menu level

param.name: parentlevel
param.label: Enable Parent Level CSS
param.description: Enable different CSS code to be used based on the parent (top) level menus

param.name: attemptvalidation
param.label: XHTML Transitional
param.description: Attempt XHTML Transitional validation - requires the contents of the mod_sbd_rollmenu.css to be placed in the template css file.

param.name: joomlaver
param.label: Joomla Version
param.description: Set version of Joomla if auto has problems.

param.name: hidemenunoscript
param.label: Hide Menu
param.description: Use CSS to hide the menu when no javascript present.

param.name: noscriptmsg
param.label: No script Msg
param.description: Text to be displayed if javascript is not present.

param.name: menutype
param.label: Menu Name
param.description: The name of the menu (default is `mainmenu`)

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: time_delay
param.label: Time Delay
param.description: Time delay before firing rollover javascript, can help with non firing of menu

param.name: menu_delay
param.label: Menu Delay
param.description: Menu delay before starting menu opening

param.name: full_active_id
param.label: Full Active highlighting
param.description: Enable full active menu item highlighting, including for `Link - Component Item` and `Link - Url`, which can cause loss of XHTML compliance, if more than one item is active

param.name: use_mouseover
param.label: Use Mouse Over
param.description: Use mouse overs to enable the Accordion menu to expand

param.name: top_linkclick
param.label: Top Menu as Link
param.description: Make the top level a clickable link to content etc or to be placed under the heading

param.name: noextramenu
param.label: Show Top Menu link
param.description: Show the top menu link again under the top menu

param.name: openparentmenu
param.label: Expand Top Menu
param.description: Expand top level menu when browsing through sub menu links

param.name: opensinglemenu
param.label: Expand One Level Menu
param.description: Always expand a menu if there is only one top item.

param.name: usecompressedjs
param.label: Use Compressed Javascript
param.description: Use compressed Javascript to speed up page loading time, disable if your having problems
